recipes.title: Shawarma
recipes.description: popular Middle Eastern dish of meat that's stacked on a vertical rotisserie, sliced, and served in a sandwich or wrap

recipes.title: Mandhi
recipes.description: Mandi is a traditional dish of meat and rice with a special blend of spices that originated in the Hadhramaut region of Yemen

recipes.title: Biriyani
recipes.description: a flavorful, aromatic, and celebratory dish of rice, meat, and spices that originated in the Indian subcontinent

recipes.title: Pasta
recipes.description: A staple food made from flour and water, and sometimes eggs, that is formed into various shapes and boiled or baked
